description_zh: Tron 计划则是 Matrix 社区之后的又一个重要业务模块。在这里，我们将基于深圳市数字创意产品化概念验证中心，整合少数派的内容、品牌、传播资源、设计能力、制造供应链、投融资服务，对接更大的优秀平台和资本，深度扶持那些专注产品的早期创业者，参与产品共创，共同迎接个性细分的全新消费时代。
description_en: The Tron Project is another important business module after the Matrix Community. Here, based on the Shenzhen Digital Creative Productization Concept Verification Center, we will integrate the content, brand, communication resources, design capabilities, manufacturing supply chain, and investment and financing services of Sspai. We will connect with larger excellent platforms and capital, deeply support early-stage entrepreneurs who focus on products, participate in product co-creation, and jointly embrace the new consumption era of personalized segmentation.
